Name: Ghost Case
About the game: A detective agency receives a request for an investigation from a woman who is suffering from stalking. However, even after proceeding with the investigation, there is no sign of the stalker. ・・・・・・ How to use Use the four-way controller (left/right) or the Tab key to switch the camera. Use the selection buttons or the numeric keypad to select actions. Click on an object in the room to show the action options. This game is a horror adventure game. This game is a horror adventure game. The player controls the character by switching the camera in each room. This game is a horror adventure game. When a horror event occurs, the main character must hide somewhere or run away. When a horror event occurs, the main character must hide somewhere or run away.
